properties.Name: ACORS Corner Landfill - SWMU 17
properties.PopupInfo:
US Army Garrison, Fort A.P. Hill

US Rte 301
Fort AP Hill VA 22427

EPA ID#: VA2210020416

EPA web page for this facility

Area shown represents ACORS CORNER LANDFILL - SWMU 17

Institutional Controls for this area include:

CA772ID - Information Device

This control is the Installation Master Plan which prohibits: (a) Use of groundwater from water table aquifer for all SWMUs and AOCs, (b) Use of all SWMUs and AOCs for residential, schools, childcare, and playground use, (c) Prohibition of earth moving activity in landfill areas, SWMUs 11-20 (d) Notification to EPA for intention to sell property, notification to prospective purchaser, (e) Notification to EPA and VDEQ in advance or proposed land use changes that may affect final remedy objectives.

Engineering Controls for this area include:

CA770NG: Non-groundwater engineering control

This control consists of landfill cap, vegetative soil cap/covers

US Rte 301
Fort AP Hill VA 22427

EPA ID#: VA2210020416

EPA web page for this facility

Area shown represents Wilcox Closed Sanitary Landfill - SWMU 16

Institutional Controls for this area include:

CA772ID - Information Device

This control is the Installation Master Plan which prohibits: (a) Use of groundwater from water table aquifer for all SWMUs and AOCs, (b) Use of all SWMUs and AOCs for residential, schools, childcare, and playground use, (c) Prohibition of earth moving activity in landfill areas, SWMUs 11-20 (d) Notification to EPA for intention to sell property, notification to prospective purchaser, (e) Notification to EPA and VDEQ in advance or proposed land use changes that may affect final remedy objectives.

CA772GC - Governmental Control

This control is a State permit for SWMU-16 and AOC-4.

Engineering Controls for this area include:

CA770NG: Non-groundwater engineering control

This control consists of landfill cap, vegetative soil cap/covers

CA770GW - Groundwater engineering control

This control is Monitored Natural Attenuation for SWMU-16.
